articles.description: Infosys employees will get 65% variable pay for the July-September quarter. For employees in the United States and Canada, the payout will be processed along with the second biweekly November payroll.
articles.content:
Infosys employees will get 65% variable pay for the July-September quarter. This will be done in the November payroll cycle for all eligible employees, according to an internal mail.
The average pay… [+1860 chars]
